fraud_analysis.reasoning: The document is a partial multi-page statement (pages 4-6 of 90) detailing inpatient consultation charges. No comprehensive financial totals (subtotal, tax, total) are present on these specific pages. All extracted line items consistently show a charge of 1,000.00 for 'IP CONSULTATION CHARGES' performed by various doctors across different medical specialties. The document exhibits a consistent format, fonts, and layout across all three pages, with no visual anomalies, signs of editing, or pixel manipulation detected. While many line items feature the same service type and amount, the presence of distinct doctor names and sequential item numbering (e.g., 13, 14, ... 54) strongly indicates these are records of separate consultation events rather than fraudulent duplication of a single charge.
